StringTable.Label: Trait_SelfGovernance_Name
StringTable.String: Self-Governance

StringTable.Label: Trait_SelfGovernance_Dec
StringTable.String:
[I]The smallest minority is the individual. You cannot deny individual and claim to defend minorities.[/I]
[COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight]+8% Approval on all Core Worlds except your Homeworld and a free Leader[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: Trait_MobilityRights_Name
StringTable.String: Mobility Rights

StringTable.Label: Trait_MobilityRights_Dec
StringTable.String:
[I]Our thrifty starbase engineers are so efficient that they can now reach resources and planets further out in space.[/I]
[COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight]+2 Starbase Range[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: Trait_FreeTrade_Name
StringTable.String: Free Trade

StringTable.Label: Trait_FreeTrade_Dec
StringTable.String:
[I]With the proper infrastructure in place, we will be far better able to capitalize on the possibilities of interstellar travel.[/I]
[COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight]Grants a free Freighter and a Trader citizen[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: Trait_FreeMarkets_Name
StringTable.String: Free Markets

StringTable.Label: Trait_FreeMarkets_Dec
StringTable.String:
[I]When any outside force exerts control on the market it will always be to its own advantage, and to the detriment of the market itself.[/I]
[COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight]+10% Global Income[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: Trait_PrivateOwnership_Name
StringTable.String: Private Ownership

StringTable.Label: Trait_PrivateOwnership_Dec
StringTable.String:
[I]We are so proficient at building Starbases that they can now maintain themselves with the resources found around them in space.[/I]
[COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight]Starbases no longer pay Maintenance[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: Trait_Enterprise_Name
StringTable.String: Enterprise

StringTable.Label: Trait_Enterprise_Dec
StringTable.String:
[I]Improved planning dramatically improves the effectiveness of our economic and military infrastructure.[/I]
[COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight]-25% Colony and Asteroid decay[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: Trait_IronFist_Name
StringTable.String: Iron Fist

StringTable.Label: Trait_IronFist_Dec
StringTable.String:
[I]When you whip a worker, it inspires immense productivity in him, and any that witness the event.[/I]
[COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight]+50 Control[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: Trait_Prestige_Name
StringTable.String: Prestige

StringTable.Label: Trait_Prestige_Dec
StringTable.String:
[I]The famous will show you what a culture values. Others worship the vapid and beautiful or the bright and curious. We revere the strong.[/I]
[COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight]Double Ship Experience[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: Trait_Service_Name
StringTable.String: Service

StringTable.Label: Trait_Service_Dec
StringTable.String:
[I]The famous will show you what a culture values. Others worship the vapid and beautiful or the bright and curious. We revere the strong.[/I]
[COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight]Soldiers Generate Approval[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: Trait_Watchful_Name
StringTable.String: Watchful

StringTable.Label: Trait_Watchful_Dec
StringTable.String:
[I]Our citizenry is protective of our infrastructure and has formed volunteer groups that patrol our territory protecting our fleets from attack.[/I]
[COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight]Fleets receive an Escort fighter inside our borders[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: Trait_Dangerous_Name
StringTable.String: Dangerous

StringTable.Label: Trait_Dangerous_Dec
StringTable.String:
[I]Our transport modules are now so efficient that they can carry escort fighters in case they are attacked.[/I]
[COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight]Unlocks Advanced Transport Modules that come with escort fighters[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: Trait_Conscription_Name
StringTable.String: Conscription

StringTable.Label: Trait_Conscription_Dec
StringTable.String:
[I]With the proper infrastructure in place, we will be far better able to capitalize on the possibilities of interstellar travel.[/I]
[COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight]Grants three free Transports[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: Trait_Discipline_Name
StringTable.String: Discipline

StringTable.Label: Trait_Discipline_Dec
StringTable.String:
[I]The famous will show you what a culture values. Others worship the vapid and beautiful or the bright and curious. We revere the strong.[/I]
[COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight]Rushing is not limited[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: Trait_Ambition_Name
StringTable.String: Ambition

StringTable.Label: Trait_Ambition_Dec
StringTable.String:
[I]You can take the life of a slave. But richly reward a man and he will give his life freely.[/I]
[COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight]Leaders cost less to hire[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: Trait_Recruiting_Name
StringTable.String: Recruiting

StringTable.Label: Trait_Recruiting_Dec
StringTable.String:
[I]Where there is no vision, the people perish.[/I]
[COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight]Reduced cooldown to use the Recruit Leaders executive order[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: Trait_Incentives_Name
StringTable.String: Incentives

StringTable.Label: Trait_Incentives_Dec
StringTable.String:
[I]Even the charitable enjoy nice things.[/I]
[COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight]+10 Loyalty for Leaders[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: Trait_CelebrateTalent_Name
StringTable.String: Celebrate Talent

StringTable.Label: Trait_CelebrateTalent_Dec
StringTable.String:
[I]Equality drags the least valuable forward while holding the most exceptional back. We should celebrate our leaders, not restrain them.[/I]
[COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight]Approval boost after recruiting a Leader[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: Trait_Merit_Name
StringTable.String: Merit

StringTable.Label: Trait_Merit_Dec
StringTable.String:
[I]Democracy is an illusion. In all forms the powerful manipulate the weak and control the outcome.[/I]
[COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight]Leaders cost even less to hire[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: Trait_Poaching_Name
StringTable.String: Poaching

StringTable.Label: Trait_Poaching_Dec
StringTable.String:
[I]Why serve a fallen empire when you can be a conquerer.[/I]
[COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight]When you capture a Core World you keep the Governor[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: Trait_Commune_Name
StringTable.String: Commune

StringTable.Label: Trait_Commune_Dec
StringTable.String:
[I]We measure success not by personal achievement, but by the growth and happiness of our neighbors.[/I]
[COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight]Worlds with over 50% Approval get +15% Growth and Influence[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: Trait_Representation_Name
StringTable.String: Representation

StringTable.Label: Trait_Representation_Dec
StringTable.String:
[I]We measure success not by personal achievement, but by the growth and happiness of our neighbors.[/I]
[COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight]All Colonies generate Influence[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: Trait_GenerationalHomes_Name
StringTable.String: Generational Homes

StringTable.Label: Trait_GenerationalHomes_Dec
StringTable.String:
[I]We have challenged the myth of urban sprawl and our citizens live more efficiently as a collective.[/I]
[COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight]+2 Population Capacity[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: Trait_SharedPurpose_Name
StringTable.String: Shared Purpose

StringTable.Label: Trait_SharedPurpose_Dec
StringTable.String:
[I]Let every idea be presented and live or die based on its merit. There is no room for morality in science, only rationality.[/I]
[COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight]+1 global citizen Resolve[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: Trait_WorkersParty_Name
StringTable.String: Workers Party

StringTable.Label: Trait_WorkersParty_Dec
StringTable.String:
[I]There is little success where there is little laughter.[/I]
[COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight]Worlds with over 50% Approval get +20% Manufacturing[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: Trait_Hope_Name
StringTable.String: Hope

StringTable.Label: Trait_Hope_Dec
StringTable.String:
[I]Let every idea be presented and live or die based on its merit. There is no room for morality in science, only rationality.[/I]
[COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight]Worlds with over 50% Approval get +15% Income[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: Trait_History_Name
StringTable.String: Sacred History

StringTable.Label: Trait_History_Dec
StringTable.String:
[I]The culture and standard of living on the homeworld civilization are admired and envied throughout the galaxy.[/I]
[COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight]+1000 Homeworld Influence Unlocks the Heritage project[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: Trait_AncestralHome_Name
StringTable.String: Ancestral Home

StringTable.Label: Trait_AncestralHome_Dec
StringTable.String:
[I]Preserving our ancestral lands is a source of pride for our citizens.[/I]
[COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight]+25% Homeworld Tourism[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: Trait_CodeOfLaw_Name
StringTable.String: Code of Law

StringTable.Label: Trait_CodeOfLaw_Dec
StringTable.String:
[I]The culture and standard of living on the homeworld civilization are admired and envied throughout the galaxy.[/I]
[COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight]Add an additional Policy slot[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: Trait_Alluring_Name
StringTable.String: Alluring

StringTable.Label: Trait_Alluring_Dec
StringTable.String:
[I]Our Starbases glitter in the deep night of space like stars formed from glass and titanium.[/I]
[COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight]All Starbases generate Influence[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: Trait_Radiant_Name
StringTable.String: Radiant

StringTable.Label: Trait_Radiant_Dec
StringTable.String:
[I]Our worlds are so prosperous and advanced that each and every one of them is idolized by the rest of the galaxy.[/I]
[COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight]+10% Influence[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: Trait_Devotion_Name
StringTable.String: Devotion

StringTable.Label: Trait_Devotion_Dec
StringTable.String:
[I]Iron can bind a man, devotion can bind a generation.[/I]
[COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight]+2 Control per Turn and all your leaders have the Tradition ideology[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: Trait_Dogma_Name
StringTable.String: Dogma

StringTable.Label: Trait_Dogma_Dec
StringTable.String:
[I]Our people are so proud that the concept of yielding to a foreign culture is impossible to conceive. They will stay loyal until the bitter end.[/I]
[COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight]Our Planets and Starbases are immune to Culture Flipping[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: Trait_Eureka_Name
StringTable.String: Eureka

StringTable.Label: Trait_Eureka_Dec
StringTable.String:
[I]Abandon the fear of change and embrace discovery.[/I]
[COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight]Approval boost after discovering a new Technology and +30 Research[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: Trait_DeepInvestigation_Name
StringTable.String: Deep Investigation

StringTable.Label: Trait_DeepInvestigation_Dec
StringTable.String:
[I]There are lessons to be learned from even the most meager sources.[/I]
[COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight]+3 Research after surveying an Anomaly[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: Trait_FocusOnEducation_Name
StringTable.String: Focus on Education

StringTable.Label: Trait_FocusOnEducation_Dec
StringTable.String:
[I]Our brightest citizens will lead us into the next era.[/I]
[COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight]+3 Scientist citizens[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: Trait_Breakthrough_Name
StringTable.String: Breakthrough

StringTable.Label: Trait_Breakthrough_Dec
StringTable.String:
[I]Science unconstrained can change everything, for good or bad.[/I]
[COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight]+60 Research[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: Trait_Logic_Name
StringTable.String: Logic

StringTable.Label: Trait_Logic_Dec
StringTable.String:
[I]The progress of logic requires an uncompromising assault on dogma and rhetoric.[/I]
[COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight]+1 global citizen Intelligence[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: Trait_RevereScience_Name
StringTable.String: Revere Science

StringTable.Label: Trait_RevereScience_Dec
StringTable.String:
[I]Do not celebrate doctors, soldiers, or entrepreneurs. Where would they be without the inventions that led to their craft?[/I]
[COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight]+10% Approval for Scientist citizens[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: Trait_QuantumLeap_Name
StringTable.String: Quantum Leap

StringTable.Label: Trait_QuantumLeap_Dec
StringTable.String:
[I]Let every idea be presented and live or die based on its merit. There is no room for morality in science, only rationality.[/I]
[COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight]+10% Global Research[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: Trait_Kindness_Name
StringTable.String: Kindness

StringTable.Label: Trait_Kindness_Dec
StringTable.String:
[I]Love and compassion are necessities, not luxuries. Without them, we cannot survive.[/I]
[COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight]Approval bonus based on Compassion +1 Diplomacy[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: Trait_Charity_Name
StringTable.String: Charity

StringTable.Label: Trait_Charity_Dec
StringTable.String:
[I]Love and compassion are necessities, not luxuries. Without them, we cannot survive.[/I]
[COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight]-10% Global Crime[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: Trait_Sustainability_Name
StringTable.String: Sustainability

StringTable.Label: Trait_Sustainability_Dec
StringTable.String:
[I]Love and compassion are necessities, not luxuries. Without them, we cannot survive.[/I]
[COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight]-10% Global Pollution[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: Trait_Humility_Name
StringTable.String: Humility

StringTable.Label: Trait_Humility_Dec
StringTable.String:
[I]We our so revered that any civilization which declares war on us will suffer a backlash from their own population.[/I]
[COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight]+2 Diplomacy[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: Trait_Favored_Name
StringTable.String: Favored

StringTable.Label: Trait_Favored_Dec
StringTable.String:
[I]We our so revered that any civilization which declares war on us will suffer a backlash from their own population.[/I]
[COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight]Anyone at war with us receives -10% Approval[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: Trait_Popular_Name
StringTable.String: Popular

StringTable.Label: Trait_Popular_Dec
StringTable.String:
[I]Our reputation as negotiators has grown to the point where even our enemies look suspiciously at anyone who declares war on us.[/I]
[COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight]Civilizations that declare war on us anger other factions[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: Trait_Consensus_Name
StringTable.String: Consensus

StringTable.Label: Trait_Consensus_Dec
StringTable.String:
[I]Our homeworld has become a neutral ground. Violating it invites the wrath of most of the galaxy's races.[/I]
[COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight]All civilizations declare war on anyone who invades our homeworld[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: Trait_Intimidating_Name
StringTable.String: Intimidating

StringTable.Label: Trait_Intimidating_Dec
StringTable.String:
[I]Our homeworld has become a neutral ground. Violating it invites the wrath of most of the galaxy's races.[/I]
[COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight]+5 [HS=HS_Intimidation]Intimidation[/HS][/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: Trait_CallousDisregard_Name
StringTable.String: Callous Disregard

StringTable.Label: Trait_CallousDisregard_Dec
StringTable.String:
[I]Make every factory and forge a spartan city such that our workers will never need to leave.[/I]
[COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight]+10% Manufacturing, -2% Approval[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: Trait_MilitaryReverence_Name
StringTable.String: Military Reverence

StringTable.Label: Trait_MilitaryReverence_Dec
StringTable.String:
[I]Our empire is not forged in the lab or the manufacturing plant, but on the battlefield.[/I]
[COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight]+3 Soldier citizens[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: Trait_Ruthless_Name
StringTable.String: Ruthless

StringTable.Label: Trait_Ruthless_Dec
StringTable.String:
[I]Make every factory and forge a spartan city such that our workers will never need to leave.[/I]
[COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight]+20% Soldiering[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: Trait_Attrition_Name
StringTable.String: Attrition

StringTable.Label: Trait_Attrition_Dec
StringTable.String:
[I]By opening ourselves up to the universe, it embraces us as well. It also rejects those that stand against us.[/I]
[COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight]-25% Hit Points for enemy ships in our borders[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: Trait_Bloodthirsty_Name
StringTable.String: Bloodthirsty

StringTable.Label: Trait_Bloodthirsty_Dec
StringTable.String:
[I]With each victory, our forces become more sure of their cause and more determined to do what is needed to achieve it.[/I]
[COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight]+1% Approval per conquered planet[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: Trait_Amiable_Name
StringTable.String: Amiable

StringTable.Label: Trait_Amiable_Dec
StringTable.String:
[I]Our reasonable approach has established a reputation that will benefit us in all our diplomatic dealings.[/I]
[COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight]+1 Diplomacy Improved Trade Values[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: Trait_Negotiators_Name
StringTable.String: Negotiators

StringTable.Label: Trait_Negotiators_Dec
StringTable.String:
[I]Our cautious but reasonable approach when speaking with our neighbors has established a reputation that will benefit us in all our diplomatic dealings.[/I]
[COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight]+3 Diplomatic Capital per turn[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: Trait_Shrewd_Name
StringTable.String: Shrewd

StringTable.Label: Trait_Shrewd_Dec
StringTable.String:
[I]Our skills as negotiators are so great that we are always able to ensure our civilizations comes out ahead in any trade.[/I]
[COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight]+25% Credits in Trades[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: Trait_Trustworthy_Name
StringTable.String: Trustworthy

StringTable.Label: Trait_Trustworthy_Dec
StringTable.String:
[I]A citizen is not simply a cog of the empire but a being of purpose and passion that we can empower to grow.[/I]
[COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight]+1 global citizen Social[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: Trait_FairTraders_Name
StringTable.String: Fair Traders

StringTable.Label: Trait_FairTraders_Dec
StringTable.String:
[I]Our trade routes are so well established that factions we trade with will do almost anything to keep them going.[/I]
[COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight]+2 Diplomacy with Civilizations we have Trade Routes with[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: Trait_Reliable_Name
StringTable.String: Reliable

StringTable.Label: Trait_Reliable_Dec
StringTable.String:
[I]Our word is more trusted in the universe than any contract.[/I]
[COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight]Other races will trade more favorably with us[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: Trait_SilverTongue_Name
StringTable.String: Silver Tongue

StringTable.Label: Trait_SilverTongue_Dec
StringTable.String:
[I]What is real is irrelevant, only what people believe to be real.[/I]
[COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight]+5 Deception All leaders have the Advocate trait[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: Trait_CriminalTies_Name
StringTable.String: Criminal Ties

StringTable.Label: Trait_CriminalTies_Dec
StringTable.String:
[I]We have traded and traveled with the darker elements of the galaxy for so long that they see us as one of them.[/I]
[COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight]Ally with the Pirates[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: Trait_Darkness_Name
StringTable.String: Darkness

StringTable.Label: Trait_Darkness_Dec
StringTable.String:
[I]Our people make sure that hostile races have a hard time getting around our territories.[/I]
[COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight]Enemy ships in our borders are -1 to Sensor Range and Moves[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: Trait_Paranoia_Name
StringTable.String: Paranoia

StringTable.Label: Trait_Paranoia_Dec
StringTable.String:
[I]Our people make sure that hostile races have a hard time getting around our territories.[/I]
[COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight]All of our Leaders are Paranoid[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: Trait_CrimeLords_Name
StringTable.String: Crime Lords

StringTable.Label: Trait_CrimeLords_Dec
StringTable.String:
[I]Our people make sure that hostile races have a hard time getting around our territories.[/I]
[COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight]Grants 3 new Leaders and +3% Global Crime[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: Trait_HiddenAgenda_Name
StringTable.String: Hidden Agenda

StringTable.Label: Trait_HiddenAgenda_Dec
StringTable.String:
[I]We have established a reputation that we can be reasoned with, and we can talk our way out of all conflicts.[/I]
[COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight]No one will declare war on us for the next 50 turns[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: Trait_Flexible_Name
StringTable.String: Flexible

StringTable.Label: Trait_Flexible_Dec
StringTable.String:
[I]We have established a reputation that we can be reasoned with, and we can talk our way out of all conflicts.[/I]
[COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight]+2% to global Income, Research and Manufacturing[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: Trait_Inviting_Name
StringTable.String: Inviting

StringTable.Label: Trait_Inviting_Dec
StringTable.String:
[I]We have established a reputation that we can be reasoned with, and we can talk our way out of all conflicts.[/I]
[COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight]+3 Citizens of random species[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: Trait_Adaptable_Name
StringTable.String: Adaptable

StringTable.Label: Trait_Adaptable_Dec
StringTable.String:
[I]Our expertise in exploration and colonization has paid off again, by allowing us to find additional usable tiles on each of our colonies.[/I]
[COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight]Gain 2 additional tiles on every Planet[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: Trait_CulturalAppreciation_Name
StringTable.String: Cultural Appreciation

StringTable.Label: Trait_CulturalAppreciation_Dec
StringTable.String:
[I]Our expertise in exploration and colonization has paid off again, by allowing us to find additional usable tiles on each of our colonies.[/I]
[COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight]+20% Tourism[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: Trait_Acceptance_Name
StringTable.String: Acceptance

StringTable.Label: Trait_Acceptance_Dec
StringTable.String:
[I]We are not defined by our species, but by our intellect and our character.[/I]
[COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight]No Approval penalty for mixed species[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: Trait_Enticing_Name
StringTable.String: Enticing

StringTable.Label: Trait_Enticing_Dec
StringTable.String:
[I]Our reputation has grown to the point that any world within our Influence begs to join our Civilization.[/I]
[COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight]All planets and Starbases within our Influence join our civilization[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: Trait_Unification_Name
StringTable.String: Unification

StringTable.Label: Trait_Unification_Dec
StringTable.String:
[I]The culture and standard of living on the homeworld civilization are admired and envied throughout the galaxy.[/I]
[COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight]+50% Homeworld Influence +25% Homeworld Manufacturing[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: Trait_SharedBelief_Name
StringTable.String: Shared Belief

StringTable.Label: Trait_SharedBelief_Dec
StringTable.String:
[I]The culture and standard of living on the homeworld civilization are admired and envied throughout the galaxy.[/I]
[COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight]+20% Resistance[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: Trait_PreferredCulture_Name
StringTable.String: Preferred Culture

StringTable.Label: Trait_PreferredCulture_Dec
StringTable.String:
[I]The culture and standard of living on the homeworld civilization are admired and envied throughout the galaxy.[/I]
[COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight]+10% Approval for our civilization species, -5% Approval for other species[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: Trait_UniqueVoice_Name
StringTable.String: Unique Voice

StringTable.Label: Trait_UniqueVoice_Dec
StringTable.String:
[I]Our reputation as negotiators has grown to the point where even our enemies look suspiciously at anyone who declares war on us.[/I]
[COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight]Civilizations that declare war on us anger other civilizations[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: Trait_CoreOfTheEmpire_Name
StringTable.String: Core of the Empire

StringTable.Label: Trait_CoreOfTheEmpire_Dec
StringTable.String:
[I]The culture and standard of living on the homeworld civilization are admired and envied throughout the galaxy.[/I]
[COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight]Homeworld Manufacturing +30%[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: Trait_CrownOfTheEmpire_Name
StringTable.String: Crown of the Empire

StringTable.Label: Trait_CrownOfTheEmpire_Dec
StringTable.String:
[I]The culture and standard of living on the homeworld civilization are admired and envied throughout the galaxy.[/I]
[COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight]Homeworld Income +30%[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: Trait_Efficiency_Name
StringTable.String: Efficiency

StringTable.Label: Trait_Efficiency_Dec
StringTable.String:
[I]The culture and standard of living on the homeworld civilization are admired and envied throughout the galaxy.[/I]
[COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight]-25% Rush costs[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: Trait_Impulsive_Name
StringTable.String: Impulsive

StringTable.Label: Trait_Impulsive_Dec
StringTable.String:
[I]The most dangerous moment is the one where we fail to act.[/I]
[COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight]+1 Ship Moves[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: Trait_Persistence_Name
StringTable.String: Persistence

StringTable.Label: Trait_Persistence_Dec
StringTable.String:
[I]The prisons that constrain our citizens are a poor substitute for the rhetoric that will win us their hearts and minds.[/I]
[COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight]+1 global citizen Diligence[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: Trait_Constructive_Name
StringTable.String: Constructive

StringTable.Label: Trait_Constructive_Dec
StringTable.String:
[I]We have established public-private partnerships to encourage the creation of Constructor vessels that will help us build out our infrastructure.[/I]
[COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight]3 Free Constructors[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: Trait_Planning_Name
StringTable.String: Planning

StringTable.Label: Trait_Planning_Dec
StringTable.String:
[I]We have established public-private partnerships to encourage the creation of Constructor vessels that will help us build out our infrastructure.[/I]
[COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight]+8 Logistics[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: Trait_Resourceful_Name
StringTable.String: Resourceful

StringTable.Label: Trait_Resourceful_Dec
StringTable.String:
[I]Anyone can collect the jewel before him, the magic is in collecting two.[/I]
[COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight]Mines Resources increase 0.1 per Turn[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: Trait_PerfectProduction_Name
StringTable.String: Perfect Production

StringTable.Label: Trait_PerfectProduction_Dec
StringTable.String:
[I]We have established public-private partnerships to encourage the creation of Constructor vessels that will help us build out our infrastructure.[/I]
[COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight]+20% Manufacturing[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: Trait_Patient_Name
StringTable.String: Patient

StringTable.Label: Trait_Patient_Dec
StringTable.String:
[I]We have established public-private partnerships to encourage the creation of Constructor vessels that will help us build out our infrastructure.[/I]
[COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight]+5 Persuasion[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: Trait_Pioneering_Name
StringTable.String: Pioneering

StringTable.Label: Trait_Pioneering_Dec
StringTable.String:
[I]Your people are eager to explore the stars, and more importantly, are willing to put up the credits to do it.[/I]
[COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight]Free Colony ship[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: Trait_GoodNeighbor_Name
StringTable.String: Good Neighbor

StringTable.Label: Trait_GoodNeighbor_Dec
StringTable.String:
[I]Races we share a border with know better than to make an issue of it.[/I]
[COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight]No penalty from sharing borders with another Civilization[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: Trait_Agrarian_Name
StringTable.String: Agrarian

StringTable.Label: Trait_Agrarian_Dec
StringTable.String:
[I]We should carefully consider the cost of technological change. It is often inferior to what the planet provides and carries a heavy cost.[/I]
[COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight]+20% Global Farming[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: Trait_Prepared_Name
StringTable.String: Prepared

StringTable.Label: Trait_Prepared_Dec
StringTable.String:
[I]We should carefully consider the cost of technological change. It is often inferior to what the planet provides and carries a heavy cost.[/I]
[COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight]+2 Ship Repair Rate[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: Trait_Cooperative_Name
StringTable.String: Cooperative

StringTable.Label: Trait_Cooperative_Dec
StringTable.String:
[I]We have grown from simple farms to gleaming towers, but we have not lost hold of our community and unity.[/I]
[COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight]No Approval penalty for Overcrowding[/COLOR]
